metadata.name: Stay The Course
metadata.description:
"I believe it's important to fight for what feeds our soul, even if the ground supporting us is nothing more that slowly shifting gravel."

Haute Montagne is French for "High Mountain".

This series is an homage to challenge, struggles and adversity. The journey is really the most important part since the destination is always moving upwards.

Take a breath, seize the moment and then look back a bit, see all the progress you've made?

This project uses minimal colors with high contrast to make a statement.

Built with p5.js
